/**
 * The BeanPreferenzeGeneriche class represents a bean object that encapsulates preferences related to font size, font style, theme, and tourist ID.
 * 
 * This class provides methods to get and set the values of these preferences, such as the font size, font style, theme, ID, and tourist ID. It also includes constructors to initialize these preferences with specified values.
 * 
 * The main functionalities of this class include:
 * - Getting and setting the font size used in the application
 * - Getting and setting the font style used for displaying text
 * - Getting and setting the theme of the object
 * - Getting and setting the ID of the object
 * - Getting and setting the ID of the tourist associated with the preferences
 * 
 * Additionally, this class includes constructors to create instances of BeanPreferenzeGeneriche with specified parameters or default values.
 * 
 * Overall, the BeanPreferenzeGeneriche class serves as a data structure to store and manage preferences related to font size, font style, theme, and tourist ID in a Java application.
 */
